tool.name: TICCalculator
tool.description: Calculates the TIC from a mass spectrometric raw file (useful for benchmarking).
tool.command:
TICCalculator
#if $param_in: -in $param_in #end if #if $param_read_method: -read_method $param_read_method #end if #if $param_loadData: -loadData $param_loadData #end if #if $adv_opts.adv_opts_selector=='advanced': #if $adv_opts.param_force: -force #end if #end if > $param_stdout

param.name: param_loadData
param.label: Whether to actually load and decode the binary data (or whether to skip decoding the binary data)

tool.help:
Calculates the TIC from a mass spectrometric raw file (useful for benchmarking).
For more information, visit http://ftp.mi.fu-berlin.de/OpenMS/release-documentation/html/UTILS_TICCalculator.html
